4. State two roles of the Holy Spirit in a believer's life.

answers_C: Pentecost was a festival observed fifty days after Passover to celebrate the close of spring harvest, marking the completion of the wheat harvest.
Jesus fulfilled His promise of sending a comforter; Disciples received the Holy Spirit and started speaking in tongues.
A sound like a mighty wind filled the room; Cloven tongues of fire appeared and settled on each disciple.
The Holy Spirit guides our utterances while spreading the good news; The Holy Spirit encourages us to keep the gospel.
Truth is that which is consistent with the mind, will, character, glory, and being of God.
